# Methods

I conducted all analyses in this thesis using R version 4.3.1 [@rcoreteam2023] in the RStudio IDE version 2023.09.1.494 [@positteam2023]. The thesis was written in Quarto version 1.3.450 [@allaire2023]. The default settings and attached packages are documented in Appendix @sec-tech. The DAGs in this thesis were drawn using the ggdag R package [@barrett2024], which is based on the software daggity [@textor2016]. All source code of this project is available at [GitHub](https://github.com/smnnlt/causal-inference-sport).
